{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16699v1", "title": "Category O for p-adic rational Cherednik algebras", "summary": "We introduce the concept of a triangular decomposition for Banach and
Fr\'echet-Stein algebras over $p$-adic fields, which allows us to define a
category $\mathcal{O}$ for a wide array of topological algebras. In particular,
we apply this concept to $p$-adic rational Cherednik algebras, which allows us
to obtain an analytic version of the category $\mathcal{O}$ developed by
Ginzburg, Guay, Opdam and Rouquier. Along the way, we study the global sections
of $p$-adic Cherednik algebras on smooth Stein spaces, and determine their
behavior with respect to the rigid analytic GAGA functor.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT,math.QA,math.RT", "published": "2025-04-23T13:29:03Z"}
